reviews.review_text: Incredible! The best tamales Ive had in awhile and definitely worth the price. I got the family pack just for myself (4 for $20) and 1.5 is perfect for a meal. No problem having leftovers tomorrow lol. Each tamale is hefty and both the corn and the filling are moist and flavorful. I like mine saucier but even without added sauce theyre so so good. Pictured below are the pork with red sauce (medium spice) and the vegan version which are both very nice
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the wonderful review and the added pictures, Alex! We are happy you enjoyed your tamales!   We appreciate your support, until next time! Best, Antojos Team

reviews.review_text: Delicious traditional & vegan Mexican food! A great little gem near Granville Island. Love their tamales, pozoles and tostadas! Everything is fresh and so tasty, highly recommend giving this place a try. Check out their rotating menu online and call ahead to order. They are also available on Uber but you can save a bit more if you call or line up to order for take out.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Diane, Thank you so much for taking the time to review our business, its much appreciated! We pride ourselves to make the best Mexican food around! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your food. We are looking forward to your next visit :) Best regards,

reviews.review_text: I have to say, Ive enjoyed every single bite of the meals from Antojos y Sabores. They have a different Traditional Mexican Meal of the Day running from Tue to Fri and on weekends they sell Pozole and Tamales! Added bonus, they sell Vegan/vegetarian options for all dishes. They are located in a commissary kitchen so the food is available for Pick-up, take out, and delivery. No dining in option. Their staff great you with a warm welcome and smile
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Mark, Thank you so much for taking the time to share your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your food. We strive to provide excellent customer service. After reading your review, I am glad to hear our staff is accomplishing this. We hope to see you again soon! Sincerely, Antojos y Sabores Team

reviews.review_text: No doubt these are the best Tamales in town: genuine mexican flavour. Make yourself a favor and get the Rajas con queso one (insert drooling happy emoji).
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Miguel, Thank you so much for sharing your review with us, we are happy you found us! :) We agree The Rajas con Queso Tamale is a must try! Nos vemos pronto!

reviews.review_text: Ok just randomly found these guys at the Carnaval Del Sol and I have decent knowledge of what a good tamales is. Well it started with one jalapeno and cheese then I wanted to try the chicken too. Well I needed up buying an extra 8 to go (2 of each flavour). This to say that these guys are super legit!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Soukaina, We are so happy you found us that day! It was a pleasure meeting you; we are so greatful for your support. Come to our kitchen to say hi! Hasta pronto :)

reviews.review_text: I recently ate at Antojos y Sabores and was blown away by the deliciousness of their tamales. The masa was perfectly cooked and had just the right amount of moisture, while the fillings were packed with flavor. I particularly enjoyed the jalapeno and cheese tamal, which had a great balance of flavour and was incredibly satisfying. The staff were also super friendly and attentive, making for a great experience overall. I highly recommend their tamales to anyone looking for authentic, tasty Mexican bite.
Mexican approved, most delicious tamales!  And the price is reasonable too.
Delicious tamales. Best Mexican food in Vancouver. Highly recommended. Five stars! Vegetarian options: Delicious vegan and vegetarian options!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Michael, Were so happy to hear you enjoyed our tamales. Thank you so much for your kind review and for supporting our business. See you again!

reviews.review_text: Delicious and carefully handled Mexican tamales and products... was happily impressed by the quality and how easy was the Takeout. People that give bad reviews were hangry customers I guess, there is no dine-in option posted anywhere. Will continue ordering  for take out and delivery!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Angie, thank you so much for appreciating our handmade tamales! Wed love to see you again

reviews.review_text: This is one of the few places that sell fresh and frozen tamales. When we lived in Southern California, we had freshly made tamales delivered to our apartment, this is the next best thing. Friendly service on the phone and at the door. This is not a restaurant where you dine in, pick up/delivery only.
The tamales are delicious. Im chilanga. Warm the tamal up. Put it in a bun ... delicious. Worth it. Well done, enough meat, sauce and seasoning. I got them from the Guerreros store in Delta.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thrilled to read your positive review, this means a lot! Thank you very much Yvette! - Cravings and Flavors Team :)
reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Thrilled to read your positive review, this means a lot! !Muchas gracias, Ivette! - Antojos y Sabores Team :)

reviews.review_text: Its fair to say that tamales from Antojos y Sabores are a staple part of our diet now. The masa is always perfectly seasoned, the moistness level is on point, and the fillings are flavourful (our fave is the green pork one). Try them pan-fried at home to take it to the next level! Thanks so much to the two lovely sister/owners for bringing your tamales to us in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Gray, Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a wonderful review, we really appreciate it. Tamales are certainly our star item, we are so happy you found us! Looking forward to seeing you soon :) Kind regards,

reviews.review_text: This place is a Must try!!! Real Mexican pozole, flautas and tamales!!! The costumer service is also very good, very nice polite Mexican people! When you pick up your order buy the door you can see the kitchen and everything is clean and organized The prices are very decent, 1 Litre of pozole is 15 dlls other places charge same amount  for a little bowl, which I would never pay. There s also carnitas, and are absolutely amazing, served with awesome pico de Gallo! We loved it so much, that we came back the same day in the afternoon to get more Glad to finally have a nice REAL Mexican place in Vancouver Erika
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Erika, Thank you so much for all your support and for your wonderful review, that means a lot to us! We are looking forward to your next visit :) Kind regards,

reviews.review_text: Delicious. Highly recommended. I usually order online and go pick them up. Jalapeno and cheese tamale is my favorite but they are all tasty.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your support, Braden! It means a lot to us, see you around!

reviews.review_text: BEST POZOLE I VE GOT! Reminds me like home! So delicious, staff super sweet and amazing customer service! I so much recommend this place :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Lui, Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a wonderful review! Looking forward to seeing you soon! Best regards,

reviews.review_text: Just had two tamales, one chicken and one with cheese and peppers. Now I know how amazing tamales can be. Absolutely delicious!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are so happy you got to try our tamales, even more when you came back a couple days later! Thank you for your support, come back again.

reviews.review_text: Awesome tamales, not something I usually order but I will definitely go out of my way to get these again.. Highly recommended!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are glad you liked your food! Thank you so much for taking the time to review our food business. We hope to see you soon! Best, Antojos Team

reviews.review_text: Came today to pick up carnitas from one of the other take out restaurants in the building. Made conversation with a woman in the lineup who said I had to try the Pozole.  It was absolutely outstanding. Can wait to try more from this place!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ryan, Thank you so much for your review!! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your Pozole! Looking forward to your next visit :)

reviews.review_text: Standing ovation! All of the vegetarian tamales are incredible and authentic. Get the sweet pineapple if you re reading this. You won t regret it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Ramon! Once again, thanks for your support! We hope to see you soon. Best, Antojos Team

reviews.review_text: Best tamale I ve ever had. Pork in green sauce was incredible. A must visit.
Such a delicious, inexpensive and comforting meal. I love the chicken/green sauce tamale, and their agua frescas are delicious!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for supporting our food business and for the review, Jocelyn! We are happy you enjoyed your meal, until next time! :) Best, Antojos y Sabores Team

reviews.review_text: Supremely authentic, supremely delicious. Not had the tacos yet, but the tamales are amazing.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Shaun, Thank you so much for sharing your wonderful review with us, we are so grateful for your 5-star rating! We hope to see you soon, Hasta Pronto!

reviews.review_text: All I am going to say is: perfection. Mexican approved. Esp the pinapple one
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Mexican approved, this puts a big smile on our face! We put a lot of love into our pineapple tamale, its made with real fruit and filled with our house jam. Thank you again for your 5-star rating Apam. - Antojos y Sabores Team

reviews.review_text: Fantastic tamales and friendly service. Highly recommend for tamales in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your review and support, Dan! We hope to see you soon!

reviews.review_text: Absolutely delicious tamales! Coming back for sure!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Bonnie, thank you so much for your wonderful review and for your support! See you around! Best, Antojos Team

reviews.review_text: Best tamales in town!  The staff are always so friendly too!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ting, Thank you so much for the 5-star rating! We really appreciate your continuous support. Looking forward to seeing you at the kitchen :) Kind regards,

reviews.review_text: Tasty and fast. Great juice too!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing your experience with us, Matthew! So happy you also enjoyed our aguas frescas, we use fresh fruits, theyre so refreshing and go well with our tamales! - Antojos y Sabores Team

reviews.review_text: Best pozole & tamales in Canada   !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Raciel, We are so grateful that you took the time to review our Tamales and Pozole! We are so happy you found in Antojos y Sabores the best tamales and pozole accross Canada! ;) Looking forward to seeing you soon, !Gracias!

reviews.review_text: The tamales here are sooooo good!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Eva, Thank you for taking the chance to share your review. We are thrilled to hear that you enyoyed your tamales! We hope to see you soon again. !Gracias! Kind regards, Antojos y Sabores Team

reviews.review_text: The best place for tamales!!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We love to hear comments like yours :) Thank you very much for reviewing our business, Angela! See you around! Best, Antojos Team

reviews.review_text: Best tamales in vancouver
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Aidan, Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review and for your support! Its much appreciated. We hope to see you soon, Hasta pronto!

reviews.review_text: Best pozole and tamales !!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Gisela, Thank you very much for sharing your review. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your Pozole and Tamales. We pride ourselves to make the best Mexican food around, Tamales and Pozole are the house specialty. We look forward to seeing you soon! Kind regards, Antojos y Sabores Team

reviews.review_text: The chicken tamales and the pineapple tamales were very rich with a lot of flavor. Most delicious tamales Ive had for a long time.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello! Thank you very much for giving us a review, we are glad you enjoyed your tamales! Once again, thank you for the review and for supporting our business :) Until next time, see you soon! - Antojos Team
reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Hola! Muchas gracias por regalarnos una resena, nos da gusto que disfruto sus tamales! Once again, thank your for the review and for supporting our business :) Until next time, hasta pronto! - Antojos Team

reviews.review_text: Authentic Mexican food! Delicious and the service is unbeatable...ask pozole and the chicken tamales, they are the best!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Yeinni, Thank you so much for taking the time to write about your wonderful experience. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your food! Tamales and Pozole are certainly our signature items. I am also very pleased to hear that our staff provided excellent customer service. We hope to see you soon. !Hasta pronto! Sincerely, Antojos y Sabores Team
reviews.review_translated_text: Autentica comida mexicana! Riquisima y la atencion es insuperable... pregunten pozole y los tamales de pollo, son lo maximo!

reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi five, Aldo! We greatly appreciate your support by giving us a 5-stars rating.
Thank you for the 5-star rating Josh! We hope to see you again soon - Antojos y Sabores Team
Thank you for the 5-star rating, Vitorio!
Were so happy to know that you liked our food, Regina! We hope to see you again.
Hi Salvador, Thank you so much for sharing your rating with us! Kind regards, Gracias! :)
Thank you for a 5 star rating Kyungtae! We appreciate it, well love to see you again.
Hi Erick, Thank you so much for the 5-star rating, its much appreciated! :) Kind regards,

reviews.review_text: I ordered delivery. The food is really good, but the entire drink spilled. So if I want the drink, I d have to drink out of a plastic bag with a sticky cup swimming in it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Ilena, We are happy you liked your food, and appreciate your feedback. Please know that we pack our food with care especially when its for delivery, we even put all drinks in a plastic bag to prevent spills from happening. Uber eats and Doordash drivers are told to carry the food with the utmost care. Unfortunately, its out of our control how they handle orders once the food leaves our kitchen. Come visit us at our location and we will make it up to you. Hope to see you soon, - Antojos y Sabores Team
Dear Elena, Thank you for sharing your review. If theres anything you want to share with us please feel free to contact us at +1 778 885 5125. !Gracias! Kind regards, Antojos y Sabores Team.

reviews.review_text: No dine in, all doors are locked
